medium: Ink and colors on gold-flecked paper
title: Scholar in his Creek Side Retreat
marks: Signature; Stamps artist\'s signature and two stamps, at ULC
description: fan mounted as an album leaf; lightly speckled with gold, small creek with a foot bridge runs in front of a small retreat where a scholar sits inside and two others are outside just in front of the retreat; another retreat is set back further hidden slightly by a mist
creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
